content:
SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement Class

In this Article

Creates and maintains the SqlWorkflowInstanceStore sub-element of the service behaviors section of a Sql workflow configuration file.

Syntax

Declaration

public class SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ConfigurationElement
  • ServiceModelConfigurationElement
  • ServiceModelExtensionElement
  • System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
  • SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement

Constructors summary

SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement()

Creates a new instance of the SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement class.

Properties summary

BehaviorType

Gets the type of a SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior object.
ConnectionString

Gets or sets the connection string to the database server.
ConnectionStringName

Gets or sets a named connection string to the database server.
HostLockRenewalPeriod

Gets or sets the time period in which the host must renew the lock on an instance.
InstanceCompletionAction

Gets or sets whether workflow instance data is kept in the persistence store after the workflow instance completes or if it is deleted at that point.
InstanceEncodingOption

Gets or sets the optional property that specifies how compression is used for instance data.
InstanceLockedExceptionAction

Gets or sets the action that occurs in response to an exception that is thrown when a workflow instance is locked.
MaxConnectionRetries

Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries. The default value is 4.
RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod

Gets or sets the stem.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod* property. Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.

Methods summary

CreateBehavior()

Returns a new object of type SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior that contains property settings for a SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement.

Constructors

  • SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement()

    Creates a new instance of the SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement class.

    public SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement ();

Properties

  • BehaviorType

    Gets the type of a SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior object.

    public override Type BehaviorType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      A type object.

  • ConnectionString

    Gets or sets the connection string to the database server.

    public string ConnectionString { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains information about the connection to the instance store database.

    Remarks

    Examples of connection string contents include provider, data source, instance store database, and integrated security information.

  • ConnectionStringName

    Gets or sets a named connection string to the database server.

    public string ConnectionStringName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string name that represents a connection to a database server.

    Remarks

    An example of a named connection string is “DefaultConnectionString”.

  • HostLockRenewalPeriod

    Gets or sets the time period in which the host must renew the lock on an instance.

    public TimeSpan HostLockRenewalPeriod { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      A timespan object that represents the lock renewal period.

    Remarks

    If the host does not renew the lock in the specified time period, the instance is unlocked and may be picked up by another host.

  • InstanceCompletionAction

    Gets or sets whether workflow instance data is kept in the persistence store after the workflow instance completes or if it is deleted at that point.

    public System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceCompletionAction InstanceCompletionAction { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • InstanceCompletionAction

      An enumeration of the actions that can occur when an instance completes.

    Remarks

    The enumerated actions consist of deleting the instance data from the persistence store or not deleting the instance data from the persistence store, when the instance has completed its operation.

  • InstanceEncodingOption

    Gets or sets the optional property that specifies how compression is used for instance data.

    public System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceEncodingOption InstanceEncodingOption { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • InstanceEncodingOption

      An option that determines the manner in which data compression is performed, if at all.

    Remarks

    Possible values for this property are “None”, which specifies no compression, and “GZip”, which specifies that instance data is compressed and uses the gzip algorithm.

  • InstanceLockedExceptionAction

    Gets or sets the action that occurs in response to an exception that is thrown when a workflow instance is locked.

    public System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedExceptionAction InstanceLockedExceptionAction { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • InstanceLockedExceptionAction

      An action response to an exception thrown.

    Remarks

    Examples of the resulting InstanceLockedExceptionAction responses can include graceful shutdown and overlapped recycling of app domains, as well as failover and recovery from host failures.

  • MaxConnectionRetries

    Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries. The default value is 4.

    public int MaxConnectionRetries { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      An integer representing the maximum number of SQL connection retries.

  • RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod

    Gets or sets the stem.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod* property. Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.

    public TimeSpan RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • TimeSpan

      Returns the time interval.

Methods

  • CreateBehavior()

    Returns a new object of type SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior that contains property settings for a SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreElement.

    protected override object CreateBehavior ();

    Returns

    • Object

      An generic object that contains workflow configuration element property settings.
